player_regression_league_mp.description: The number of starts at which point a QB's off-season regression to the league average has fallen to 50% of it's max

player_regression_league_height.description: Maximum amount of off-season regression a QB receives to the league average

player_regression_career_mp.description: The number of starts at which a QB is receiving 50% of their rolling long term average off-season regression

player_regression_career_height.description: Maximum amount of off-season regression to a QBs rolling long term average

player_sf.description: Alpha for the players week over week EWMA

player_career_sf_base.description: The base rate for alpha in a player's career rolling EWMA

player_career_sf_height.description: The maximum amount of additional alpha a player's career EWMA can receive

player_career_sf_mp.description: The number of starts at which point a player's career EWMA has received 50% of it's maximum additional alpha

player_prog_disc_alpha.description: Amount to progressivelydiscount the projection error by when updating a player's value

player_team_adj_allotment_disc.description: The percent of the team's other QB adjustments that should be received by this QB in their first start as a backup

rookie_draft_intercept.description: Intercept for the rookie draft regression curve

rookie_draft_slope.description: Slope for the rookie draft regression curve

rookie_league_reg.description: Regression of a the team's previous QB Value to the league average

rookie_league_cap.description: Maximum discount to the league average for a rookie QB

rookie_undrafted_draft_number.description: Draft position assigned to an undrafted rookie

team_off_league_reversion.description: Reversion to the league average for a team's starting QB value

team_off_qb_reversion.description: Reversion of the team's starting QB value to their week 1 starter QB value

team_off_sf.description: Alpha for the team's QB value week over week EWMA

team_def_sf.description: Alpha for the team's defense value week over week EWMA

team_def_reversion.description: Reversion of the team's defense value to the league average

wind_disc_mp.description: Midpoint of the wind discount curve

temp_disc_mp.description: Midpoint of the temperature discount curve

init_value.description: Initial value the league's QB value average
